name: City of Treason Debut CD
description: Featuring six powerfully distinct songs, City of Treason's self-titled debut makes a commanding statement. From the hearts and souls of people with the belief that music is the portal to something more, these songs touch upon themes that are at once original, yet universal. Love and loss, war and death, individuality and isolation, the struggles and triumphs everyone faces are captured with raw emotion and bared for all to hear. Written by City of Treason and co-written and produced by Sahaj Ticotin of Ra, this record isn't just a debut, it's a declaration.

name: Official CoT "BloodWing" T-Shirt
description: Introducing the "BloodWing", City of Treason's first official t-shirt! Impress fellow rockers and scare small children with this fashionable cotton/polyester blend of badassness. Available in four sizes!

name: CoT CD/T-Shirt Mega-Combo Deal
description: You love to save money, and we love to sell merch, so this is the perfect deal for everyone involved! Get CoT's self-titled debut album AND our official "BloodWing" t-shirt for a mere $20, making yourself a happy headbanging camper and saving yourself five bucks in the process.
